HOW IT WORKS

Create an Account

To start this journey it all begins with signing up for an account which takes just few minutes and voila you automatically have access your growth dashboard where you can invest,watch your btc grow and payout once you complete an investment cycle.

Begin to earn more Bitcoin

Grow Your Bitcoin

Because we believe so much that there always an easy way of doing things, which is why we designed this platform to help you grow your bitcoin the easy and secure way, you can start growing your btc immediately after having accessing to your dashboard by choosing an investment plan that suits your budget.

Start Investing Now

Withdraw Your Bitcoin

For every good venture deserves a reward, which is why we made the payout experience easy and seamless that it only takes couple of minutes to get your bitcoin to your wallet once you request for payout via your dashboard. You are eligible to ask for a payout once you complete the 30 days investment cycle.

Begin to earn more Bitcoin

Wondering What We Do With Your Bitcoin?

Wondering what we do with your bitcoin?, we know this is the big question running down your mind that you so want an answer to. Due to our strong and global partnerships with chain of experienced and successful cryptocurrency traders in US, UK, Singapore and Hong kong, what we basically do is loan your prestigious bitcoin to experienced and successful crypto-traders that are in partnership with BTCFX to trade in the crypto-economy.
